rukus.text: veila `adin ehahum huda. kale ya kavmi-`budu-llahe ma lekum min ilahin gayruh. efela tettekun
kale-lmeleu-llezine keferu min kavmihi inna lenerake fi sefahetiv veinna lenezunnuke mine-lkazibin
kale ya kavmi leyse bi sefahetuv velakinni rasulum mir rabbi-l`alemin
ubelligukum risalati rabbi veena lekum nasihun emin
eve`acibtum en caekum zikrum mir rabbikum `ala raculim minkum liyunzirakum. vezkuru iz ce`alekum hulefae mim ba`di kavmi nuhiv vezadekum fi-lhalki bastah. fezkuru alae-llahi le`allekum tuflihun
kalu eci'tena lina`bude-llahe vahdehu venezera ma kane ya`budu abauna. fe'tina bima te`iduna in kunte mine-ssadikin
kale kad veka`a `aleykum mir rabbikum ricsuv vegadab. etucadiluneni fi esmain semmeytumuha entum veabaukum ma nezzele-llahu biha min sultan. fenteziru inni me`akum mine-lmuntezirin
feenceynahu vellezine me`ahu birahmetim minna vekata`na dabira-llezine kezzebu biayatina vema kanu mu'minin
